import React from 'react' import { inject, observer } from 'mobx-react'; import { LeftOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; import { Button, Badge, DatePicker, Card, Timeline, Empty } from 'antd'; import moment from 'moment'; import './index.less' import PieChart from './PieChart' @inject('StatisticsStore') @observer class StatisticsManage extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = {} } render() { const { detailInfo, searchDate } = this.props.StatisticsStore const { RangePicker } = DatePicker; return (
{/* 日期： */}
{detailInfo.deviceName}
{detailInfo.deviceStatus ? : }
设备编号
{detailInfo.deviceCode}
设备型号
{detailInfo.deviceModelName}
设备类型
{detailInfo.deviceTypeName}
合作伙伴编码
{detailInfo.customerCode}
合作伙伴名称
{detailInfo.customerName}
维修次数
{detailInfo.maintainCount}
{detailInfo.exceptionMap ? : }

故障日志：

{detailInfo.workVOList ? detailInfo.workVOList.map((item, index) => (
故障描述：{item.description}
报修人：{item.applyName}
故障上报时间：{item.createTime}
维修人：{item.workerName}
工号：{item.workNo}
故障解决时间：{item.expecteTime}
 )) : }
); } changeDate = (e, formate) => { this.props.StatisticsStore.searchDate = formate } handelClick = (e) => { console.log(e) this.props.StatisticsStore.columnsType = e.id } } export default StatisticsManage;
